no-perm.title: No Permission
no-perm.description: You must have the `%1` permission to run this command!

description.notify:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixnotify <user>`

Arguments:
`user` - A mentioned user
description.setprefix:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixsetprefix <prefix>`

Arguments:
`prefix` - A string or a single character
description.todo:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixtodo <text>`

Arguments:
`text` - A string
description.setperm:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixsetperm <permission> <role> <allow/deny/clear>`

Arguments:
`permission` - A permission from the list below
`role` - Mention a role
`allow/deny/clear` - Allow/Deny/Clear the permission

Available permissions:
`%perms`
description.setcolor:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixsetcolor [member] <hex color>`

Arguments:
`member` - Mention a member
`hex color` - A color represented in hexadecimal (#ffffff - White)
description.rank:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixrank [optional member]`

Arguments:
`member` - Mention a member
description.give-xp:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixgive-xp <member> <amount>`

Arguments:
`member` - Mention a member
`amount` - A positive whole number (smaller than 1 million)
description.remove-xp:
Please use the command like this:
`%prefixremove-xp <member> <amount>`

Arguments:
`member` - Mention a member
`amount` - A positive whole number

description.notify: The mentioned user has been notified

setcolor.own: You have changed your color to %1

setperm.allow: You have given the permission %1 to the role %2
setperm.deny: You have taken the permission %1 from the role %2
setperm.clear: You have cleared the permission %1 from the role %2

description.help:
Here is a list of all the available commands:
`%prefixrank` - Shows your server card.
`%prefixgive-xp` - Gives you or another user xp.
`%prefixremove-xp` - Removes xp from you or from another user.
`%prefixsetperm` - Allow/Deny a permission from a role.
`%prefixsetprefix` - Sets this bot's prefix.

setperm.alreadyHas: This role already has this permission!

notify.not-in-your-channel: This user is not in your voice channel!
notify.not-in-channel: This user is not in a voice channel!
notify.user-not-in-channel: You are not currently in a channel!

level-up: Παιδιά εγώ σας έχω για το καλύτερο τμήμα..
